Package uno.anahata.asi.model.tool

Class AbstractToolResponse<C extends AbstractToolCall<?,?>>

java.lang.Object
uno.anahata.asi.model.core.AbstractPart
uno.anahata.asi.model.tool.AbstractToolResponse<C>
Type Parameters:
C - The specific type of the Call this response is for.
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
BadToolResponse, JavaMethodToolResponse
public abstract class AbstractToolResponse<C extends AbstractToolCall<?,?>> extends AbstractPart
Represents the response of a tool call, designed for deferred execution. The fields are populated by the execute() method.
Author:
anahata-gemini-pro-2.5

      public abstract void execute()
      Executes the tool logic. This method is responsible for populating the status, result, error, and executionTimeMillis fields.

      public abstract void stop()
      Stops the tool execution if it is currently running.

    • getDefaultTurnsToKeep

      protected int getDefaultTurnsToKeep()
      Description copied from class: AbstractPart
      Template method hook for subclasses to provide their specific default retention policy. This is the fallback value used when no explicit turnsToKeep is set on the instance.
      Specified by:
      getDefaultTurnsToKeep in class AbstractPart
      Returns:
      The default number of turns for this part type.

    • asText

      public String asText()
      Description copied from class: AbstractPart
      Returns the content of the part as a simple string. This is implemented by subclasses.
      Specified by:
      asText in class AbstractPart
      Returns:
      The text representation of the part.
